Position 1
==========

Councilmember John Ellisor
--------------------------

Councilmember John Ellisor is a 47 year resident of Friendswood. Â He was elected as Judge of the 122nd Judicial District Court in 2002 and retired at the end of 2022.

May 2024 - May 2027

### City Council Committees

* Member of the College of the State Bar

![IMG_7615](https://www.ci.friendswood.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5269)

### John Ellisor

Position 1

[Email](mailto:jellisor@friendswood.com)

**Mailing Address**
Friendswood City Hall
910 S Friendswood Drive
Friendswood, TX 77546

Phone: (281) 996-3270

Individuals and organizations wishing to invite the Mayor or Councilmember(s) to an event or function are asked to submit the online request form.

You may
[email](mailto:citysecretary@ci.friendswood.tx.us)
your request, hand-deliver or mail your request to City Secretary's Office at 910 S. Friendswood Drive, Friendswood, Texas 77546-4856.

Please note that requests must be submitted two weeks in advance. The availability of elected officials is not guaranteed.
